Package iot.mqtt

Interface MqttClientBasicApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
MqttMock, PahoMqttClient
public interface MqttClientBasicApi
Interface with basic API for a mqtt client

    • connect

      void connect()
      To connect to the server

    • disconnect

      void disconnect()
      To disconnect to server

    • publish

      void publish​(java.lang.String topic, MqttMessageType message)
      Publish a message with a specified topic
      Parameters:
      topic - the message topic
      message - the message

    • subscribe

      <T extends MqttMessageType> void subscribe​(java.lang.Object subscriber, java.lang.String topicFilter, java.lang.Class<T> classMessage, java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.String,​T> messageConsumer)
      Subscribe to all the topic that start with topicFilter
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the received message on this topic
      Parameters:
      subscriber - instance oh the subscriber
      topicFilter - the topic filter with support to the wildcard '+' and '#'
      classMessage - the class of the message that will be receive
      messageConsumer - consumer for the message already converted to the required class

    • unsubscribe

      void unsubscribe​(java.lang.Object subscriber, java.lang.String topicFilter)
      Unsubscribe a topic previous subscribed
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the subscriber
      topicFilter - the topic previous subscribed
